channel.title: GitHub Erlang Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Erlang in GitHub

item.title: ninenines/cowboy
item.description: Small, fast, modern HTTP server for Erlang/OTP.

item.title: emqx/emqx
item.description: The most scalable and reliable MQTT broker for AI, IoT, IIoT and connected vehicles

item.title: ninenines/gun
item.description: HTTP/1.1, HTTP/2, Websocket client (and more) for Erlang/OTP.

item.title: talentdeficit/jsx
item.description: an erlang application for consuming, producing and manipulating json. inspired by yajl

item.title: erlang/rebar3
item.description: Erlang build tool that makes it easy to compile and test Erlang applications and releases.

item.title: proper-testing/proper
item.description: PropEr: a QuickCheck-inspired property-based testing tool for Erlang

item.title: vernemq/vernemq
item.description: A distributed MQTT message broker based on Erlang/OTP. Built for high quality & Industrial use cases. The VerneMQ mission is active & the project maintained. Thank you for your support!

item.title: apache/couchdb
item.description: Seamless multi-primary syncing database with an intuitive HTTP/JSON API, designed for reliability

item.title: potatosalad/erlang-jose
item.description: JSON Object Signing and Encryption (JOSE) for Erlang and Elixir

item.title: jcomellas/getopt
item.description: Erlang module to parse command line arguments using the GNU getopt syntax

item.title: mochi/mochiweb
item.description: MochiWeb is an Erlang library for building lightweight HTTP servers.
